name: ncsa.clowder-files-sequence-classification-model-finetuner
description: Chose from a list of huggingface models and finetune them on a clowder training file. The model is then evaluated with a test file. Only for sequence classification tasks.
author: Vismayak Mohanarajan

MODEL_NAME.title: Model name
MODEL_NAME.description: The name of the Sequence Classification model to use. See https://huggingface.co/models for a list of available models.

DATA_TYPE.title: Data Type
DATA_TYPE.description: The type of data to be used for training. For example, csv or json.

LOCAL_TRAIN_FILE_ID.title: Training File Clowder ID
LOCAL_TRAIN_FILE_ID.description: The ClowderID of the file containing the training data.

LOCAL_TEST_FILE_ID.title: Test File Clowder ID
LOCAL_TEST_FILE_ID.description: The ClowderID of the file containing the test data.

NUM_LABELS.title: Number of labels
NUM_LABELS.description: The number of labels in the dataset.

MODEL_FILE_NAME.title: Model File Name
MODEL_FILE_NAME.description: File name of the fine-tuned model.
